faster-decompression.name: Fast Save Loading
faster-decompression.description: Speeds up decompression of the save file, making game loading significantly faster

fast-saving.name: Fast Saving
fast-saving.description: Use a significantly faster compressor to save data to your savefile. Prevents the game for hanging for a few seconds every time it's closed.

uncompressed-saves.name: Uncompressed Save
uncompressed-saves.description:
Stores the save data without compression, resulting in slightly faster loading & saving times.

<cy>Note: this may increase the size of your savefile by up to 50%.</c>

async-glfw.name: Async GLFW
async-glfw.description:
<cp>Note: experimental!</c>

Pre-initializes GLFW on a different thread, while doing other loading tasks in parallel. May be unstable and cause crashes.

async-fmod.name: Async FMOD
async-fmod.description:
<cp>Note: experimental!</c>

Initializes FMOD on a different thread, while doing other loading tasks in parallel. May be unstable and cause crashes.

load-more.name: Load more resources
load-more.description: Loads extra resources during launch (backgrounds, etc.), causing some extra load time but no lagspikes if those textures have to be loaded mid-level.

low-memory-mode.name: Low memory mode
low-memory-mode.description: Causes blaze to use less memory, disables some optimizations related to caching data in memory. You should <cy>only</c> enable this if memory usage is a significant concern.

image-cache.name: Image cache
image-cache.description: After loading an image, cache it using a quicker format (FPNG), then in future load the cached version instead.

image-cache-small.name: Smaller image cache
image-cache-small.description: When this option and <cy>Image cache</c> are enabled, only cache images bigger than 64kb.
